original_text: Then Moses and Aaron went from the presence of the assembly to the entrance of the tent of meeting and fell on their faces. And the glory of the Lord appeared to them,
korean_text: 모세와 아론이 회중 앞을 떠나 회막 문에 이르러 엎드리매 여호와의 영광이 그들에게 나타나며

sentences.original_text: Then Moses and Aaron went from the presence of the assembly
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 모세와 아론은 회중 앞에서 나와서

sentences.original_text: to the entrance of the tent of meeting
And the glory of the Lord appeared to them,
